name: Poo-tee-weet
description: In the 51st century scientists are able to unravel many mysteries of the universe, but they did not find answers to the questions «What is good and evil?» , «Is therelife after death?», «What is reality?», «What is the soul and is does it exist?». To solve all these problems were created special androids, which went on a journey through space to search for descriptions and explanations of the incomprehensible in other advanced and not very advanced civilizations.
